channel.title: Homes on Khalil H Najafi
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Khalil H Najafi

item.description:
“Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school” â€” Albert Einstein
(function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Khalil H Najafi is formally a data scientist, born from the domains of econometrics and applied statistics. His approach is very much grounded in the scientific method, focusing on generating and prioritizing the right questions (which can be tremendously difficult itself) then analyzing all relevant data (including qualitative factors) to evaluate hypotheses, and most importantly, begin the process of creating knowledge. Outside of speaking in the 3rd person, I am a huge fan of Batman, hats, football (as in football football; go City), and most of all, my wife & two bambinos :)

item.title: Teaching
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at University X: CS101: An intro to computer science CS102: An intro to computer science CS103: An intro to computer science CS104: An intro to computer science CS105: An intro to computer science CS106: An intro to computer science CS107: An intro to computer science
